question: Worldâ€™s largest visa centre has been opened in which of the following cities recently?
explanation: India\'s home minister Rajnath Singh has recently inaugurated the world\'s largest state-of-the-art visa centre in Dhaka with modern facilities, promising shorter waiting times for applicants. This Integrated centre at Jamuna Future Park (JFP), Dhaka is the largest Indian visa centre in the world with 18,500 square feet commercial area.
